name: Spectrum
description: Spectrum is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its shiny black box body adorned with stylish shades, Spectrum is a unique and eye-catching member of the club. Its buttons have a soldier design, giving it a touch of strength and resilience. Its arms and legs are inspired by cats, providing it with agility and grace. The screen also features a cat pattern, adding a playful touch to its appearance.
